general.question: How do I get started with your software development services?
general.answer: Getting started is easy! Contact us through our website or schedule a consultation. During the initial meeting, we'll discuss your business goals, challenges, and vision to create a detailed proposal outlining the solution, timeline, and costs.

general.question: How long does it take to develop custom software?
general.answer: The development timeline depends on the project's complexity, features, and scope. On average, a small-scale project can take 3-6 months, while more complex solutions may require 9-12 months or longer.

general.question: How much does custom software development cost?
general.answer: The cost varies based on factors like the number of features, design complexity, integrations, and ongoing maintenance needs. We provide detailed cost estimates after the initial consultation, ensuring transparency.

general.question: What industries do you specialize in for custom software solutions?
general.answer: We specialize in several industries, including education, libraries, healthcare, finance, retail, and logistics. Our expertise allows us to understand the unique challenges of each sector and deliver tailored solutions that meet industry standards.

general.question: What happens if I need changes after the software is completed?
general.answer: We understand that business needs evolve. After project completion, we offer flexibility for future enhancements and modifications through ongoing support contracts or ad hoc service agreements. You can request new features, integrations, or updates anytime.

general.question: Will my software integrate with existing systems and tools?
general.answer: Yes, we prioritize seamless integration with your existing tools and systems to avoid disruptions. Whether it's a CRM, ERP, or third-party API, our development team ensures compatibility for a unified workflow.

general.question: Does your software come with warranty?
general.answer: Yes, there is a Warranty Period of 1 year for the proposed solution, which will commence immediately after the date of User Acceptance Test Sign-Off. Any defects caused by misconfiguration and coding errors during this Warranty Period shall be resolved free of charge.

project.question: Can I track the progress of my project?
project.answer: Yes, transparency is essential to us. We provide regular updates, progress reports, and demos during the development process. You'll also have access to a dedicated project manager to discuss milestones and give feedback throughout the project.

project.question: Do you use Agile methodology in your development process?
project.answer: Yes, we follow Agile practices to ensure flexibility and adaptability during the development process. This allows us to deliver iterative progress and incorporate your feedback at every stage, ensuring the final product aligns with your vision.

project.question: How do you ensure the quality of the software?
project.answer: We follow a rigorous quality assurance (QA) process, including automated testing, manual testing, and peer code reviews. This ensures the software is free of bugs, performs optimally, and meets all project requirements before delivery.

project.question: What are emergency releases?
project.answer: Emergency Release is when a software fault prevents the system from operating correctly, a fix (patch) is made available as an emergency release. It addresses only the critical problem in question and is temporary in nature, replaced by the next maintenance release.

support.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support for the software?
support.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive maintenance services that include fixing bugs, implementing upgrades, enhancing security, and improving performance. Whether it's scheduled updates or emergency fixes, we ensure your software operates smoothly.

support.question: What if my software needs emergency support?
support.answer: We offer emergency support to address critical issues, ensuring minimal downtime. Clients can contact us 24/7 via email, and over the phone during working days. Our team responds promptly to resolve the issue.

hero.title: Asset Management System
hero.subtitle: Asset Management System fully compliant with KEWPA & KEWPS. From registration to disposal, all in one platform.

items.title: Scattered Data
items.description: Asset records in Excel, physical documents, and different systems make tracking and updating difficult.

items.title: Slow Manual Process
items.description: KEWPA/KEWPS audits and reports take weeks due to complex manual processes.

items.title: Non-Compliance Risk
items.description: Without automated systems, it's difficult to ensure 100% compliance with government procedures.

solution.title: Empower Asset Management
solution.subtitle: System designed specifically to meet the needs of Malaysian government agencies and corporations.

features.title: Digital Asset Registration
features.description: Register and label assets with QR code/barcode. All data stored in one centralized platform.

features.title: KEWPA & KEWPS Compliant
features.description: System designed to meet all Malaysian government circular requirements.

features.title: Real-time Reports
features.description: Generate automatic reports for audits, inspections, and compliance in a few clicks.

features.title: Scheduled Maintenance
features.description: Automate maintenance schedules with notifications and complete history records.

steps.title: Register & Setup
steps.description: We help set up the system and import your existing asset data into the platform.

steps.title: Label & Scan
steps.description: Generate QR code labels and start scanning for fast digital asset registration.

steps.title: Manage & Report
steps.description: Manage assets and generate automatic KEWPA/KEWPS reports whenever needed.

testimonial.quote: This system makes our work easier. KEWPA reports that used to take 2 weeks are now completed in 1 hour.
testimonial.name: Mr. Ahmad Razif

items.title: Interactive Dashboard
items.description: Complete visual display of asset status, value, and maintenance in one view.

items.title: KEWPA Reports
items.description: Generate BR, KEW.PA-2 to KEW.PA 17 reports automatically.

items.title: KEWPS Reports
items.description: Full support for KEW.PS 1 to KEW.PS-21.

items.title: Mobile App
items.description: Access the system from your phone to scan and update assets in the field.

plans.name: PRO

plans.name: ENTERPRISE

items.question: What is Tech-Lead Asset Management System?
items.answer: Tech-Lead provides an asset management system fully compliant with KEWPA & KEWPS for Malaysian government agencies and corporations. The system helps manage asset registration, maintenance, disposal, and reporting digitally.

items.question: How do I get started with the system?
items.answer: You can contact us through the demo form or WhatsApp to get a free system demonstration. We will discuss your requirements and provide a 7-day free trial access.

items.question: Does the system support QR Code & Barcode scanning?
items.answer: Yes, our system fully supports QR Code and Barcode scanning for quick asset registration, location tracking, and inventory audits. You can scan using your mobile phone or a dedicated scanner.

items.question: Can the system be accessed via mobile phone?
items.answer: Yes, our system has a mobile application available for download on Android and iOS. Users can access, scan, and update asset data from anywhere.

items.question: How secure is the data?
items.answer: Your data is stored securely using SSL/TLS encryption. Our system complies with government data security standards and provides automatic backup and tiered access controls.

items.question: What technical support is provided?
items.answer: We provide technical support via phone, email, WhatsApp, and on-site service for Enterprise packages. Our support team is available during business hours to assist with any issues.

cta.title: Start managing your assets today
cta.subtitle: Try free for 7 days. No credit card required.
